resources.string: 5 logic games that will train your brain

Tic-tac-toe is a game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3Ã—3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. X always makes the first move. Press \"Lat\'s try\" and train with our mega smart computer

Create the number 24 using the numbers 1, 3, 4, and 6. You can add, subtract, multiply and divide. You can use parentheses too. You can only use each digit once. You cannot use exponents. You cannot do like this (14-6) x 3. Press \"Lat\'s try\" and try to solve this task on our emulator

This logic game is very simple. You just need to click on the buttons with numbers in ascending order. But you have to handle very quickly. Press \"Lat\'s try\" button and try to do this task in our emulator.
The rules of this game are simple. It is necessary to build digits in sequence from 1 to 15 (sixteenth must be empty). But the game itself is complex. Press \"Lat\'s try\" and prove yourselves
This game is very similar to Barley-Break. But here you have to assemble a picture and it very difficult. Press \"Lat\'s try\" and start training.
